from this conversation any suggestion for alister

Based on the provided conversation, it seems that Alister initiated a plan to go out and have lunch with Carmen Bounce, but Carmen seemed hesitant at first. However, Alister managed to persuade her, and they both agreed to meet up. Since they both seem to be open to spending time together, it might be a good idea for Alister to plan a fun and engaging activity for them to do during their outing. They could try out a new restaurant, visit a local attraction, or engage in an outdoor activity like hiking or biking. It's important for Alister to be respectful of Carmen's boundaries and preferences, and to communicate clearly with her throughout their time together. Overall, Alister should aim to have a fun and enjoyable experience with Carmen while also being mindful of her needs and interests.
it seem like carmen not interested with alister

While she initially seemed hesitant about going out, she eventually agreed to meet up with him. If Alister is interested in pursuing a relationship with Carmen, he may want to consider asking her out again and seeing how she responds. If she declines, he should respect her decision and move on.
i think alister have to ask carmen in advance couple of days

That could be a good approach. By asking Carmen out in advance, Alister gives her time to make plans and adjust her schedule if necessary. This also shows that Alister values Carmen's time and is considerate of her needs. If Carmen is interested in seeing Alister again, she may appreciate the advance notice and be more likely to say yes to a future date.
